fields.name: Karol Sliwka
fields.about: I am the owner of the Abovewave. I'm a multi-talented human with over 2+ years of experience. You can call me a Full-Stack Developer, Fron-End Developer, Experience Designer, UI/UX Designer, or by any other market defined function-title. I'm also a multi-disciplinary maker with experience in a wide range of design disciplines. I am a music enthusiast, photographer, and more.
